title: Hey, so I'm not getting the beta pop up
body:
So I'm in NA, and it seems that the open beta has started. However the pop-up notification that you receive upon opening the client is well, not popping up. Is anyone else having this issue? Wish there was a manual download to avoid this problem, seems this shitty client is making its one last effort to jab me in the ribs... just one last time. lol




I'm sad.

replies.body:
Open Beta hasn't rolled out to NA yet, so you won't see any notifications until it's been fully rolled out.

I hope this cleared up the confusion. Let me know if you have any other questions.
